title: New: Mannequins on 7th Street – Sofia
content:
Having wowed with their debut track, the epic, beauteous Wailing of Hesione, London via Belgium duo Mannequins on 7th Street have released a second track in as many weeks, the more electronically orientated Sofia.

Mixing the immaculate vocals that stood out on their first outing, with a slick, almost R&B inspired beat, it’s one of those tracks that you never really want to end.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
